author: Emma Davie,Preston Mulligan
title: Friend of N.S. woman who died last week urges domestic violence victims to ask for help
description: The friend of a Nova Scotia woman who died last week in what prosecutors are calling a domestic homicide is urging people in abusive relationships to reach out for help.
content:
The friend of a Nova Scotia woman who died last week in what prosecutors are calling a domestic homicide is urging people in abusive relationships to reach out for help.
Police were called to a home on Glen Arbour Way in Hammonds Plains, N.S., on Thursday af… [+3014 chars]
